title: -Added landscape layouts
message:
-Added landscape layouts
-Removed forced-portrait from manifest
-Adapted playgame code to use animations that are appropriate for landscape vs. portrait

title: -Added code for app shortcuts
message:
-Added code for app shortcuts
-Created blue icons for the shortcuts

title: -Implemented ability for users to add their own custom coping skills
message:
-Implemented ability for users to add their own custom coping skills
-New preferences screen has been added for this functionality
-Number of enabled skills is now saved in a sharedpreferences file (to allow for tallying hard-coded and custom skills)
-Code was updated for enabling/disabled coping cards based on number of enabled included coping skills and custom coping skills
-Gameplay was updated to handle appropriate random number generation for included coping skills and custom skills
-Added code allowing for removal of custom skills
-Added code for alertdialog for entry of custom skills
-Added trash icon (for use with custom list display/management)
-Updated strings for new settings
-Created new style for listview that is used to display the custom coping skills

title: -Bumped version number to 2.0
message: -Bumped version number to 2.0

title: -Implemented coping skill selection settings
message:
-Implemented coping skill selection settings
-If all coping skills disabled, coping cards are disabled; if at least one is enabled, they are able to be turned back on
-Fixed the general preferences screen so it updates appropriate after exit from the coping skill selection screen
-The play game syntax loops through random numbers until it finds a coping skill that's enabled

title: -Added loop to emotion card randomizer to prevent the same emotion from showing…
message: -Added loop to emotion card randomizer to prevent the same emotion from showing up twice in a row (while maintaining slight preference for "happy" cards)

message: -Removed unnecessary imports

title: -Added additional code to programmatically add content descriptions for images (for accessibility)
message: -Added additional code to programmatically add content descriptions for images (for accessibility)

message:

-Added image and description for each of the emotions
-Fixed scrolling behavior of the tabs

title: -Updated wording of the gameplay suggestions (no longer refers to a toggle in…
message:
-Updated wording of the gameplay suggestions (no longer refers to a toggle in the nav drawer; mentions setting to disable skipping)

message: -Fixed "skip toggle" being enabled on reload of settings screen while the "cope toggle" is off

message: -Fixed card background colors (hopefully) by creating separate drawables for each (rather than updating the color programmatically, which wasn't reliable)

title: -Added newer graphics of faces, including individual faces for each emotion
message:
-Added newer graphics of faces, including individual faces for each emotion
-Gameplay now updates each card to show the appropriate emotion face

title: -Added a setting to enable/disable skipping of "difficult" emotion cards (if…
message:
-Added a setting to enable/disable skipping of "difficult" emotion cards (if disabled, must get a coping card)
-Skipping is disabled automatically when coping cards are disabled (as the setting doesn't matter)

-Home screen image now properly fills up space, so the layout is more responsive and will work better across screen sizes
-Removed home screen text (shouldn't be needed)

title: 3. Moved "about game/dev" and "privacy policy" to bottom of navigation drawer,…
message:

4. Forcing portrait mode across the app until proper landscape mode can be programmed
